fi.vincit.multiusertest.rule.expection.call

Class ExpectCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.vincit.multiusertest.rule.expection.call.ExpectCall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExpectCallFail, ExpectCallNotFail, Expectation

    public class ExpectCall
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExpectCallFail, ExpectCallNotFail

    Expect a function call to throw or not throw an exception. Default exception is AuthorizationRule's exception. A custom exception can be given via toFailWithException(Class, UserIdentifiers) method.

    toFail* and notToFail methods can't be mixed together. I.e. only toFail(...).toFailWithException(...) and notToFail(...).notToFail(...) calls are allowed. Not toFail(...).notToFail(...). Otherwise it would be difficult to determine what to do with the definitions that are not defined since the expectation doesn't have access to all available definitions.

    Use Expectations to create instances.

        Description copied from interface: ExpectCallFail
        Expect the call to fail with given users. If the call doesn't fail with AccessDenied exception, then the thrown exception will pass through as is.

                                          UserIdentifiers identifiers)
        Description copied from interface: ExpectCallFail
        Expect the call to fail with a defined exception for given users. If the call doesn't fail with the specified exception then the thrown exception will pass through as is.

      • toFailWithException

        public ExpectCallFail toFailWithException(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable> exception,
                                          UserIdentifiers identifiers,
                                          ExceptionAssertionCall exceptionAssertionCall)
        Description copied from interface: ExpectCallFail
        Expect the call to fail with a defined exception for given users. The expected exception values can be verified in the given exceptionAssertionCall. If the call doesn't fail with the specified exception then the thrown exception will pass through as is.
        Specified by:
        toFailWithException in interface ExpectCallFail
        Parameters:
        exception - Exception to expect
        identifiers - A set of user identifiers for which the call is expected to fail
        exceptionAssertionCall - Anonymous class or lambda expression where thrown expected exception values can be verified
        Returns:
        ExpectCall object for chaining

      • notToFail

        public ExpectCallNotFail notToFail(UserIdentifiers identifiers)
        Description copied from interface: ExpectCallNotFail
        Don't expect the call to fail with given users. If the call does fail with any exception, then the thrown exception will pass through as is.
        Specified by:
        notToFail in interface ExpectCallNotFail
        Parameters:
        identifiers - A set of users for which the call is not expected to fail
